title: HTML
course_description: HTML tutorial or HTML 5 tutorial provides basic and advanced concepts of HTML. Our HTML tutorial is developed for beginners and professionals. In our tutorial, every topic is given step-by-step so that you can learn it in a very easy way. If you are new in learning HTML, then you can learn HTML from basic to a professional level and after learning HTML with CSS and JavaScript you will be able to create your own interactive and dynamic website. But Now We will focus on HTML only in this tutorial.
learnFeatures: Everything you need to learn about html
All resources including quiz, recorded class, notes etc

title: JAVA SCRIPT
course_description: Our JavaScript Tutorial is designed for beginners and professionals both. JavaScript is used to create client-side dynamic pages.  JavaScript is an object-based scripting language which is lightweight and cross-platform. JavaScript is not a compiled language, but it is a translated language. The JavaScript Translator (embedded in the browser) is responsible for translating the JavaScript code for the web browser.
learnFeatures: Everything you need to learn about java script
